content.text: Match abandoned due to weather problems, TSG 1899 Hoffenheim 0, Besiktas 0.
Second Half ends, TSG 1899 Hoffenheim 0, Besiktas 0.
Second Half begins TSG 1899 Hoffenheim 0, Besiktas 0.
Substitution, TSG 1899 Hoffenheim. Marco Terrazzino replaces Sandro Wagner.
Substitution, TSG 1899 Hoffenheim. Niklas Süle replaces Jonathan Schmid.
Substitution, TSG 1899 Hoffenheim. Mark Uth replaces Jeremy Toljan.
Substitution, TSG 1899 Hoffenheim. Benjamin Hübner replaces Steven Zuber.
Substitution, TSG 1899 Hoffenheim. Ádám Szalai replaces Andrej Kramaric.
Substitution, TSG 1899 Hoffenheim. Kerem Demirbay replaces Ermin Bicakcic.
Substitution, TSG 1899 Hoffenheim. Kim Jin-Su replaces Lukas Rupp.
First Half ends, TSG 1899 Hoffenheim 0, Besiktas 0.
Oguzhan Ozyakup (Besiktas) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Substitution, Besiktas. Andreas Beck replaces Kerim Frei because of an injury.
Olcay Sahan (Besiktas) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
